page.title: 09CHILWELL. People.
page.content:
We went to visit Mr Arthur Reeder. He lives on Chilwell High Road and collects old traction engines. He also had a cart and a 1932 lorry called Big John. He used to have a steam-roller called Katie. We went inside a big organ he owns. He showed us how the organ worked and a brown car which was made in 1928. He takes the organ in the back of a 'Plessey' van and takes it to shows. He had to sell his steam roller because he had asthma and the steam upset him. He was a very interesting man to talk to.
Meadow Lane School.
